Text: The Fruit Bowl was a post-season college football bowl game held in December at Kezar Stadium in San Francisco, California.

Triplets:<The Fruit Bowl

Text: Fruit Bowl:  The game was held three times, following the 1947-1949 seasons.

Text: Fruit Bowl:  The first two games featured college teams and the last involved club teams.
